publications.title: Understanding User Behavior in Virtual Reality Environments
publications.abstract: This paper presents a comprehensive study of user behavior patterns in immersive virtual reality environments. We conducted a longitudinal study with 120 participants over 6 months.

publications.title: AI-Powered Accessibility Tools for Web Navigation
publications.abstract: We introduce a novel AI-powered browser extension that enhances web accessibility for users with visual impairments through intelligent content summarization and navigation assistance.

publications.title: Collaborative Design in Distributed Teams
publications.abstract: An exploration of collaboration patterns and tool usage in geographically distributed design teams, with implications for remote work tool design.
